citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
9/18/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to a family member
who stated the licensee was not home and calling the licensee who stated they would not be available for inspection.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on 
9/18/2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and speaking to a family member 
who stated the licensee was not home and calling the licensee who stated they would not be available for inspection. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
